snippet.title: THE HIVE - Trailer (New FPS Game 2020)
snippet.description:
THE HIVE Reveal Trailer (New FPS Game 2020)

Support the Kickstarter for THE HIVE Here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/the-hive/the-hive-a-round-based-modern-warfare-looter-shooter

The Hive is a new round based First-Person-Looter-Shooter set in an NPC-filled, devastated world. The Hive combines competitive FPS and RPG elements to deliver a unique experience. A mix of online multiplayer combat, boss fights and events that change with every new major content update.

Discover new areas, Collect gear, improve your character and try to make it out alive! If you die, you’ll not only lose what you gathered up to this point, but also what you brought with you into this world. Make it out alive and use your new and improved gear to dominate our weekend only competitive PVP mode!
